Title: Forced Entry
Plot: Laura Rowen (guest star Megan Ward), a Marine's wife, shoots an intruder in self defense when he is about to rape her. The team takes upon the case and finds out that the wife is leading a double life while her husband is serving overseas. Allegedly, she has been chatting with a stranger on the net and had no idea about his true intentions. The team believes that she might have lured him to her home, not knowing that he is a serial rapist...
ParentalRatingReason: R13 Violence and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Megan Ward, Missy Yager, Neil Hopkins, Lindsay Price, Sterling Macer Jr., Brian Dietzen, Josh Daugherty
